title: Cryptocurrency Estimations (request)
description: Get the current estimations for cryptocurrencies. E.g. Withdrawal fee.

currency_code.description: Cryptocurrency code for which fee estimation is provided.

subscribe.description: [Optional] If set to 1, will send updates whenever there is an update to crypto estimations.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field. Maximum size is 3500 bytes.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
